text.0: A misleading WhatsApp message claims that President Buhari recently approved a salary structure for teachers that is the same as that of the police. Read the facts here:  https://t.co/QIGEl1uw2h #DubawaChecks
text.1: A viral message on WhatsApp claims that the federal government is giving out a '3 million' grant to Nigerians. However, findings show that the website attached to the message is bogus and set up to spread false information. Read here: https://t.co/joIjKkh9uE #DubawaChecks
text.2: Femi Fani-Kayode recently made some claims about Oyo State’s landmass, economy and population in relation to other Nigerian states and some European countries. We fact-checked these claims. Read here: https://t.co/tmiNVm0ZXp #DubawaChecks
